channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-23105|2024-08-03T03:36:19.191Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20active%20directory%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Active Directory Plugin 2.25 and earlier does not encrypt the transmission of data between the Jenkins controller and Active Directory servers in most configurations.

item.title: CVE-2022-27206|2024-08-03T05:25:32.328Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitlab%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins GitLab Authentication Plugin 1.13 and earlier stores the GitLab client secret unencrypted in the global config.xml file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-25183|2024-08-03T04:36:06.299Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20shared%20groovy%20libraries%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Shared Groovy Libraries Plugin 552.vd9cc05b8a2e1 and earlier uses the names of Pipeline libraries to create cache directories without any sanitization, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM using specially crafted library names if a global Pipeline library configured to use caching already exists.

item.title: CVE-2022-20614|2024-08-03T02:17:52.949Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mailer%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Mailer Plugin 391.ve4a_38c1b_cf4b_ and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read access to use the DNS used by the Jenkins instance to resolve an attacker-specified hostname.

item.title: CVE-2022-27218|2024-08-03T05:25:32.671Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20incapptic%20connect%20uploader%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins incapptic connect uploader Plugin 1.15 and earlier stores tokens unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins controller where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-27201|2024-08-03T05:25:32.222Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20semantic%20versioning%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Semantic Versioning Plugin 1.13 and earlier does not restrict execution of an controller/agent message to agents, and implements no limitations about the file path that can be parsed, allowing attackers able to control agent processes to have Jenkins parse a crafted file that uses external entities for extraction of secrets from the Jenkins controller or server-side request forgery.

item.title: CVE-2022-27197|2024-08-03T05:25:32.462Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20dashboard%20view%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Dashboard View Plugin 2.18 and earlier does not perform URL validation for the Iframe Portlet's Iframe source URL, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure views.

item.title: CVE-2022-28158|2024-08-03T05:48:37.486Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20phoenix%20autotest%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Pipeline: Phoenix AutoTest Plugin 1.3 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-25207|2024-08-03T04:36:06.608Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20chef%20sinatra%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Chef Sinatra Plugin 1.20 and earlier allows attackers to have Jenkins send an HTTP request to an attacker-controlled URL and have it parse an XML response.

item.title: CVE-2022-25193|2024-08-03T04:36:06.519Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20snow%20commander%20plugin
item.description: Missing permission checks in Jenkins Snow Commander Plugin 1.10 and earlier allow attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified webserver using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-28160|2024-08-03T05:48:37.311Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20tests%20selector%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Tests Selector Plugin 1.3.3 and earlier allows users with Item/Configure permission to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller.

item.title: CVE-2022-25209|2024-08-03T04:36:06.442Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20chef%20sinatra%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Chef Sinatra Plugin 1.20 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2022-28149|2024-08-03T05:48:37.384Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20job%20and%20node%20ownership%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Job and Node ownership Plugin 0.13.0 and earlier does not escape the names of the secondary owners, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-25210|2024-08-03T04:36:06.458Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20convertigo%20mobile%20platform%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Convertigo Mobile Platform Plugin 1.1 and earlier uses static fields to store job configuration information, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to capture passwords of the jobs that will be configured.

item.title: CVE-2022-28156|2024-08-03T05:48:37.350Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20phoenix%20autotest%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Phoenix AutoTest Plugin 1.3 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Configure permission to copy arbitrary files and directories from the Jenkins controller to the agent workspace.

item.title: CVE-2022-23106|2024-08-03T03:36:19.211Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20configuration%20as%20code%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Configuration as Code Plugin 1.55 and earlier used a non-constant time comparison function when validating an authentication token allowing attackers to use statistical methods to obtain a valid authentication token.

item.title: CVE-2022-27212|2024-08-03T05:25:32.367Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20list%20git%20branches%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins List Git Branches Parameter Plugin 0.0.9 and earlier does not escape the name of the 'List Git branches (and more)' parameter, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-25176|2024-08-03T04:36:05.777Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20groovy%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Groovy Plugin 2648.va9433432b33c and earlier follows symbolic links to locations outside of the checkout directory for the configured SCM when reading the script file (typically Jenkinsfile) for Pipelines, allowing attackers able to configure Pipelines to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-25187|2024-08-03T04:36:06.450Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20support%20core%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Support Core Plugin 2.79 and earlier does not redact some sensitive information in the support bundle.

item.title: CVE-2022-20618|2024-08-03T02:17:52.908Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 737.vdf9dc06105be and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read access to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-25205|2024-08-03T04:36:06.646Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20dbcharts%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins dbCharts Plugin 0.5.2 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified database via JDBC using attacker-specified credentials and to determine if a class is available in the Jenkins instance.

item.title: CVE-2022-25211|2024-08-03T04:36:05.791Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20swamp%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins SWAMP Plugin 1.2.6 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified web server using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-20612|2024-08-03T02:17:53.077Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins 2.329 and earlier, LTS 2.319.1 and earlier allows attackers to trigger build of job without parameters when no security realm is set.

item.title: CVE-2022-25206|2024-08-03T04:36:06.547Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20dbcharts%20plugin
item.description: A missing check in Jenkins dbCharts Plugin 0.5.2 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified database via JDBC using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-28150|2024-08-03T05:48:36.847Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20job%20and%20node%20ownership%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Job and Node ownership Plugin 0.13.0 and earlier allows attackers to change the owners and item-specific permissions of a job.

item.title: CVE-2022-25174|2024-08-03T04:36:06.646Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20shared%20groovy%20libraries%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Shared Groovy Libraries Plugin 552.vd9cc05b8a2e1 and earlier uses the same checkout directories for distinct SCMs for Pipeline libraries, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to invoke arbitrary OS commands on the controller through crafted SCM contents.

item.title: CVE-2022-28136|2024-08-03T05:48:36.558Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20jiratestresultreporter%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins JiraTestResultReporter Plugin 165.v817928553942 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-23117|2024-08-03T03:36:20.033Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20conjur%20secrets%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Conjur Secrets Plugin 1.0.9 and earlier implements functionality that allows attackers able to control agent processes to retrieve all username/password credentials stored on the Jenkins controller.

item.title: CVE-2022-27214|2024-08-03T05:25:31.127Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20release%20helper%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Release Helper Plugin 1.3.3 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-27204|2024-08-03T05:25:32.320Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20extended%20choice%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Extended Choice Parameter Plugin 346.vd87693c5a_86c and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL.

item.title: CVE-2022-27199|2024-08-03T05:25:31.111Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cloudbees%20aws%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins CloudBees AWS Credentials Plugin 189.v3551d5642995 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an AWS service using an attacker-specified token.

item.title: CVE-2022-25202|2024-08-03T04:36:06.532Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20promoted%20builds%20%28simple%29%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Promoted Builds (Simple) Plugin 1.9 and earlier does not escape the name of custom promotion levels, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Overall/Administer permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-23107|2024-08-03T03:36:19.199Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20warnings%20next%20generation%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Warnings Next Generation Plugin 9.10.2 and earlier does not restrict the name of a file when configuring custom ID, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to write and read specific files with a hard-coded suffix on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-27198|2024-08-03T05:25:32.083Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cloudbees%20aws%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins CloudBees AWS Credentials Plugin 189.v3551d5642995 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an AWS service using an attacker-specified token.

item.title: CVE-2022-23111|2024-08-03T03:36:19.206Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20publish%20over%20ssh%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Publish Over SSH Plugin 1.22 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified SSH server using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-20616|2024-08-03T02:17:52.979Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20credentials%20binding%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Credentials Binding Plugin 1.27 and earlier does not perform a permission check in a method implementing form validation, allowing attackers with Overall/Read access to validate if a credential ID refers to a secret file credential and whether it's a zip file.

item.title: CVE-2022-25188|2024-08-03T04:36:05.956Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20fortify%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Fortify Plugin 20.2.34 and earlier does not sanitize the appName and appVersion parameters of its Pipeline steps, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to write or overwrite .xml files on the Jenkins controller file system with content not controllable by the attacker.

item.title: CVE-2022-25178|2024-08-03T04:36:06.504Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20shared%20groovy%20libraries%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Shared Groovy Libraries Plugin 552.vd9cc05b8a2e1 and earlier does not restrict the names of resources passed to the libraryResource step, allowing attackers able to configure Pipelines permission to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-27202|2024-08-03T05:25:32.222Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20extended%20choice%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Extended Choice Parameter Plugin 346.vd87693c5a_86c and earlier does not escape the value and description of extended choice parameters of radio buttons or check boxes type, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-25198|2024-08-03T04:36:05.841Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20scp%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins SCP publisher Plugin 1.8 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified SSH server using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-25204|2024-08-03T04:36:06.439Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20doktor%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Doktor Plugin 0.4.1 and earlier implements functionality that allows agent processes to render files on the controller as Markdown or Asciidoc, and error messages allow attackers able to control agent processes to determine whether a file with a given name exists.

item.title: CVE-2022-20619|2024-08-03T02:17:52.944Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 737.vdf9dc06105be and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-25195|2024-08-03T04:36:06.288Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20autonomiq%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins autonomiq Plugin 1.15 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-23113|2024-08-03T03:36:19.213Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20publish%20over%20ssh%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Publish Over SSH Plugin 1.22 and earlier performs a validation of the file name specifying whether it is present or not, resulting in a path traversal vulnerability allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to discover the name of the Jenkins controller files.

item.title: CVE-2022-27208|2024-08-03T05:25:32.460Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20kubernetes%20continuous%20deploy%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Kubernetes Continuous Deploy Plugin 2.3.1 and earlier allows users with Credentials/Create permission to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller.

item.title: CVE-2022-25197|2024-08-03T04:36:06.402Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20hashicorp%20vault%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HashiCorp Vault Plugin 336.v182c0fbaaeb7 and earlier implements functionality that allows agent processes to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-28140|2024-08-03T05:48:37.205Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20flaky%20test%20handler%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Flaky Test Handler Plugin 1.2.1 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2022-25196|2024-08-03T04:36:05.841Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitlab%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins GitLab Authentication Plugin 1.13 and earlier records the HTTP Referer header as part of the URL query parameters when the authentication process starts, allowing attackers with access to Jenkins to craft a URL that will redirect users to an attacker-specified URL after logging in.

item.title: CVE-2022-20617|2024-08-03T02:17:52.926Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker%20commons%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Docker Commons Plugin 1.17 and earlier does not sanitize the name of an image or a tag, resulting in an OS command execution vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission or able to control the contents of a previously configured job's SCM repository.

item.title: CVE-2022-27200|2024-08-03T05:25:32.336Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20folder-based%20authorization%20strategy%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Folder-based Authorization Strategy Plugin 1.3 and earlier does not escape the names of roles shown on the configuration form, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Overall/Administer permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-28142|2024-08-03T05:48:37.099Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20proxmox%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Proxmox Plugin 0.6.0 and earlier disables SSL/TLS certificate validation globally for the Jenkins controller JVM when configured to ignore SSL/TLS issues.

item.title: CVE-2022-23118|2024-08-03T03:36:19.962Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20debian%20package%20builder%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Debian Package Builder Plugin 1.6.11 and earlier implements functionality that allows agents to invoke command-line `git` at an attacker-specified path on the controller, allowing attackers able to control agent processes to invoke arbitrary OS commands on the controller.

item.title: CVE-2022-28148|2024-08-03T05:48:37.874Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20continuous%20integration%20with%20toad%20edge%20plugin
item.description: The file browser in Jenkins Continuous Integration with Toad Edge Plugin 2.3 and earlier may interpret some paths to files as absolute on Windows, resulting in a path traversal vulnerability allowing attackers with Item/Read permission to obtain the contents of arbitrary files on Windows controllers.

item.title: CVE-2022-27207|2024-08-03T05:25:32.491Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20global-build-stats%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins global-build-stats Plugin 1.5 and earlier does not escape multiple fields in the chart configuration on the 'Global Build Stats' page, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Overall/Administer permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-28145|2024-08-03T05:48:37.289Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20continuous%20integration%20with%20toad%20edge%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Continuous Integration with Toad Edge Plugin 2.3 and earlier does not apply Content-Security-Policy headers to report files it serves, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission or otherwise able to control report contents.

item.title: CVE-2022-23110|2024-08-03T03:36:19.206Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20publish%20over%20ssh%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Publish Over SSH Plugin 1.22 and earlier does not escape the SSH server name, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Overall/Administer permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-25199|2024-08-03T04:36:06.621Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20scp%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins SCP publisher Plugin 1.8 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified SSH server using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-25184|2024-08-03T04:36:06.364Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20build%20step%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Build Step Plugin 2.15 and earlier reveals password parameter default values when generating a pipeline script using the Pipeline Snippet Generator, allowing attackers with Item/Read permission to retrieve the default password parameter value from jobs.

item.title: CVE-2022-23116|2024-08-03T03:36:19.213Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20conjur%20secrets%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Conjur Secrets Plugin 1.0.9 and earlier implements functionality that allows attackers able to control agent processes to decrypt secrets stored in Jenkins obtained through another method.

item.title: CVE-2022-25203|2024-08-03T04:36:05.751Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20team%20views%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Team Views Plugin 0.9.0 and earlier does not escape team names, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Overall/Read permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-27215|2024-08-03T05:25:32.279Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20release%20helper%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Release Helper Plugin 1.3.3 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-25212|2024-08-03T04:36:06.498Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20swamp%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins SWAMP Plugin 1.2.6 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified web server using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-23108|2024-08-03T03:36:19.201Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20badge%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Badge Plugin 1.9 and earlier does not escape the description and does not check for allowed protocols when creating a badge, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-25208|2024-08-03T04:36:06.563Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20chef%20sinatra%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Chef Sinatra Plugin 1.20 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to have Jenkins send an HTTP request to an attacker-controlled URL and have it parse an XML response.

item.title: CVE-2022-27216|2024-08-03T05:25:32.295Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20dbcharts%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins dbCharts Plugin 0.5.2 and earlier stores JDBC connection passwords unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-28151|2024-08-03T05:48:37.176Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20job%20and%20node%20ownership%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Job and Node ownership Plugin 0.13.0 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Read permission to change the owners and item-specific permissions of a job.

item.title: CVE-2022-28133|2024-08-03T05:48:36.605Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20server%20integration%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Server Integration Plugin 3.1.0 and earlier does not limit URL schemes for callback URLs on OAuth consumers, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to create BitBucket Server consumers.

item.title: CVE-2022-28147|2024-08-03T05:48:37.427Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20continuous%20integration%20with%20toad%20edge%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Continuous Integration with Toad Edge Plugin 2.3 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to check for the existence of an attacker-specified file path on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-28154|2024-08-03T05:48:37.426Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20coverage%2Fcomplexity%20scatter%20plot%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Coverage/Complexity Scatter Plot Plugin 1.1.1 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2022-28146|2024-08-03T05:48:36.756Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20continuous%20integration%20with%20toad%20edge%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Continuous Integration with Toad Edge Plugin 2.3 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Configure permission to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller by specifying an input folder on the Jenkins controller as a parameter to its build steps.

item.title: CVE-2022-25177|2024-08-03T04:36:06.654Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20shared%20groovy%20libraries%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Shared Groovy Libraries Plugin 552.vd9cc05b8a2e1 and earlier follows symbolic links to locations outside of the expected Pipeline library when reading files using the libraryResource step, allowing attackers able to configure Pipelines to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-25180|2024-08-03T04:36:06.394Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20groovy%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Groovy Plugin 2648.va9433432b33c and earlier includes password parameters from the original build in replayed builds, allowing attackers with Run/Replay permission to obtain the values of password parameters passed to previous builds of a Pipeline.

item.title: CVE-2022-27209|2024-08-03T05:25:31.115Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20kubernetes%20continuous%20deploy%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Kubernetes Continuous Deploy Plugin 2.3.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-23115|2024-08-03T03:36:19.192Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20batch%20task%20plugin
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in Jenkins batch task Plugin 1.19 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read access to retrieve logs, build or delete a batch task.

item.title: CVE-2022-27196|2024-08-03T05:25:31.127Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20favorite%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Favorite Plugin 2.4.0 and earlier does not escape the names of jobs in the favorite column, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure or Item/Create permissions.

item.title: CVE-2022-28135|2024-08-03T05:48:37.169Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20instant-messaging%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins instant-messaging Plugin 1.41 and earlier stores passwords for group chats unencrypted in the global configuration file of plugins based on Jenkins instant-messaging Plugin on the Jenkins controller where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-25201|2024-08-03T04:36:06.623Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20checkmarx%20plugin
item.description: Missing permission checks in Jenkins Checkmarx Plugin 2022.1.2 and earlier allow attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified webserver using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-25189|2024-08-03T04:36:05.782Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20custom%20checkbox%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Custom Checkbox Parameter Plugin 1.1 and earlier does not escape parameter names of custom checkbox parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-25191|2024-08-03T04:36:05.930Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20agent%20server%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Agent Server Parameter Plugin 1.0 and earlier does not escape parameter names of agent server parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-20620|2024-08-03T02:17:52.924Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ssh%20agent%20plugin
item.description: Missing permission checks in Jenkins SSH Agent Plugin 1.23 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read access to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-27210|2024-08-03T05:25:32.252Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20kubernetes%20continuous%20deploy%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Kubernetes Continuous Deploy Plugin 2.3.1 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified SSH server using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-23112|2024-08-03T03:36:19.173Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20publish%20over%20ssh%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Publish Over SSH Plugin 1.22 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read access to connect to an attacker-specified SSH server using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-20615|2024-08-03T02:17:52.951Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20matrix%20project%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Matrix Project Plugin 1.19 and earlier does not escape HTML metacharacters in node and label names, and label descriptions, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Agent/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-27213|2024-08-03T05:25:32.559Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20environment%20dashboard%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Environment Dashboard Plugin 1.1.10 and earlier does not escape the Environment order and the Component order configuration values in its views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with View/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-25186|2024-08-03T04:36:06.418Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20hashicorp%20vault%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HashiCorp Vault Plugin 3.8.0 and earlier implements functionality that allows agent processes to retrieve any Vault secrets for use on the agent, allowing attackers able to control agent processes to obtain Vault secrets for an attacker-specified path and key.

item.title: CVE-2022-28138|2024-08-03T05:48:37.870Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rocketchat%20notifier%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins RocketChat Notifier Plugin 1.4.10 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credential.

item.title: CVE-2022-28137|2024-08-03T05:48:37.679Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20jiratestresultreporter%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins JiraTestResultReporter Plugin 165.v817928553942 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-28141|2024-08-03T05:48:36.817Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20proxmox%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Proxmox Plugin 0.5.0 and earlier stores the Proxmox Datacenter password unencrypted in the global config.xml file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-27203|2024-08-03T05:25:32.336Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20extended%20choice%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Extended Choice Parameter Plugin 346.vd87693c5a_86c and earlier allows attackers with Item/Configure permission to read values from arbitrary JSON and Java properties files on the Jenkins controller.

item.title: CVE-2022-28153|2024-08-03T05:48:37.236Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20sitemonitor%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins SiteMonitor Plugin 0.6 and earlier does not escape URLs of sites to monitor in tooltips, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-28159|2024-08-03T05:48:37.379Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20tests%20selector%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Tests Selector Plugin 1.3.3 and earlier does not escape the Properties File Path option for Choosing Tests parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-28143|2024-08-03T05:48:37.160Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20proxmox%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Proxmox Plugin 0.7.0 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified host using attacker-specified username and password (perform a connection test), disable SSL/TLS validation for the entire Jenkins controller JVM as part of the connection test (see CVE-2022-28142), and test a rollback with attacker-specified parameters.

item.title: CVE-2022-27211|2024-08-03T05:25:32.264Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20kubernetes%20continuous%20deploy%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Kubernetes Continuous Deploy Plugin 2.3.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified SSH server using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-20621|2024-08-03T02:17:52.871Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20metrics%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Metrics Plugin 4.0.2.8 and earlier stores an access key unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-25190|2024-08-03T04:36:05.954Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20conjur%20secrets%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Conjur Secrets Plugin 1.0.11 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-25181|2024-08-03T04:36:05.788Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20shared%20groovy%20libraries%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability in Jenkins Pipeline: Shared Groovy Libraries Plugin 552.vd9cc05b8a2e1 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Configure permission to execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM through crafted SCM contents, if a global Pipeline library already exists.

item.title: CVE-2022-28152|2024-08-03T05:48:36.816Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20job%20and%20node%20ownership%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Job and Node ownership Plugin 0.13.0 and earlier allows attackers to restore the default ownership of a job.

item.title: CVE-2022-25179|2024-08-03T04:36:05.767Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20multibranch%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Multibranch Plugin 706.vd43c65dec013 and earlier follows symbolic links to locations outside of the checkout directory for the configured SCM when reading files using the readTrusted step, allowing attackers able to configure Pipelines permission to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-25192|2024-08-03T04:36:06.188Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20snow%20commander%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Snow Commander Plugin 1.10 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified webserver using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-25185|2024-08-03T04:36:05.762Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20generic%20webhook%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Generic Webhook Trigger Plugin 1.81 and earlier does not escape the build cause when using the webhook, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-20613|2024-08-03T02:17:52.870Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mailer%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Mailer Plugin 391.ve4a_38c1b_cf4b_ and earlier allows attackers to use the DNS used by the Jenkins instance to resolve an attacker-specified hostname.

item.title: CVE-2022-28155|2024-08-03T05:48:37.266Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20phoenix%20autotest%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Phoenix AutoTest Plugin 1.3 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2022-25200|2024-08-03T04:36:06.496Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20checkmarx%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Checkmarx Plugin 2022.1.2 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified webserver using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-25175|2024-08-03T04:36:06.194Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20multibranch%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Multibranch Plugin 706.vd43c65dec013 and earlier uses the same checkout directories for distinct SCMs for the readTrusted step, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to invoke arbitrary OS commands on the controller through crafted SCM contents.

item.title: CVE-2022-23114|2024-08-03T03:36:20.028Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20publish%20over%20ssh%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Publish Over SSH Plugin 1.22 and earlier stores password unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-27217|2024-08-03T05:25:32.347Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20vmware%20vrealize%20codestream%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Vmware vRealize CodeStream Plugin 1.2 and earlier stores passwords unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins controller where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-23109|2024-08-03T03:36:19.195Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20hashicorp%20vault%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HashiCorp Vault Plugin 3.7.0 and earlier does not mask Vault credentials in Pipeline build logs or in Pipeline step descriptions when Pipeline: Groovy Plugin 2.85 or later is installed.

item.title: CVE-2022-28157|2024-08-03T05:48:37.133Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20phoenix%20autotest%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Phoenix AutoTest Plugin 1.3 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Configure permission to upload arbitrary files from the Jenkins controller via FTP to an attacker-specified FTP server.

item.title: CVE-2022-28134|2024-08-03T05:48:36.842Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20server%20integration%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Server Integration Plugin 3.1.0 and earlier does not perform permission checks in several HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to create, view, and delete BitBucket Server consumers.

item.title: CVE-2022-25173|2024-08-03T04:36:05.779Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20groovy%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Groovy Plugin 2648.va9433432b33c and earlier uses the same checkout directories for distinct SCMs when reading the script file (typically Jenkinsfile) for Pipelines, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to invoke arbitrary OS commands on the controller through crafted SCM contents.

item.title: CVE-2022-28144|2024-08-03T05:48:36.863Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20proxmox%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Proxmox Plugin 0.7.0 and earlier does not perform a permission check in several HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified host using attacker-specified username and password (perform a connection test), disable SSL/TLS validation for the entire Jenkins controller JVM as part of the connection test (see CVE-2022-28142), and test a rollback with attacker-specified parameters.

item.title: CVE-2022-25182|2024-08-03T04:36:05.826Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20shared%20groovy%20libraries%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability in Jenkins Pipeline: Shared Groovy Libraries Plugin 552.vd9cc05b8a2e1 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Configure permission to execute arbitrary code on the Jenkins controller JVM using specially crafted library names if a global Pipeline library is already configured.

item.title: CVE-2022-28139|2024-08-03T05:48:36.808Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rocketchat%20notifier%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins RocketChat Notifier Plugin 1.4.10 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-27205|2024-08-03T05:25:31.110Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20extended%20choice%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Extended Choice Parameter Plugin 346.vd87693c5a_86c and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL.

item.title: CVE-2022-27195|2024-08-03T05:25:31.103Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20parameterized%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Parameterized Trigger Plugin 2.43 and earlier captures environment variables passed to builds triggered using Jenkins Parameterized Trigger Plugin, including password parameter values, in their `build.xml` files. These values are stored unencrypted and can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-25194|2024-08-03T04:36:05.840Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20autonomiq%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins autonomiq Plugin 1.15 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL server using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-34147|2024-08-02T02:51:09.825Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20telegram%20bot%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Telegram Bot Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier stores the Telegram Bot token unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2024-34146|2024-08-02T02:42:59.969Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20server%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git server Plugin 114.v068a_c7cc2574 and earlier does not perform a permission check for read access to a Git repository over SSH, allowing attackers with a previously configured SSH public key but lacking Overall/Read permission to access these repositories.

item.title: CVE-2024-34148|2024-08-02T02:51:09.888Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier programmatically disables the fix for CVE-2016-3721 whenever a build is triggered from a release tag, by setting the Java system property 'hudson.model.ParametersAction.keepUndefinedParameters'.

item.title: CVE-2024-34145|2024-08-02T02:43:00.455Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving sandbox-defined classes that shadow specific non-sandbox-defined classes in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34144|2024-08-02T02:42:59.914Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving crafted constructor bodies in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-5273|2024-08-01T21:11:12.451Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20report%20info%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Report Info Plugin 1.2 and earlier does not perform path validation of the workspace directory while serving report files, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to retrieve Surefire failures, PMD violations, Findbugs bugs, and Checkstyle errors on the controller file system by editing the workspace path.

item.title: CVE-2024-28152|2024-07-25T19:50:54.373Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 866.vdea_7dcd3008e and earlier, except 848.850.v6a_a_2a_234a_c81, when discovering pull requests from forks, the trust policy "Forks in the same account" allows changes to Jenkinsfiles from users without write access to the project when using Bitbucket Server.

item.title: CVE-2024-2215|2024-07-25T19:52:01.223Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker-build-step%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins docker-build-step Plugin 2.11 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified TCP or Unix socket URL, and to reconfigure the plugin using the provided connection test parameters, affecting future build step executions.

item.title: CVE-2024-39458|2024-07-05T20:18:50.446Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20structs%20plugin
item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.title: CVE-2024-39460|2024-06-26T19:00:20.037Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 886.v44cf5e4ecec5 and earlier prints the Bitbucket OAuth access token as part of the Bitbucket URL in the build log in some cases.

item.title: CVE-2024-39459|2024-06-26T17:06:27.043Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20plain%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: In rare cases Jenkins Plain Credentials Plugin 182.v468b_97b_9dcb_8 and earlier stores secret file credentials unencrypted (only Base64 encoded) on the Jenkins controller file system, where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system (global credentials) or with Item/Extended Read permission (folder-scoped credentials).

item.title: CVE-2024-39460|2024-06-26T17:06:27.695Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 886.v44cf5e4ecec5 and earlier prints the Bitbucket OAuth access token as part of the Bitbucket URL in the build log in some cases.

item.title: CVE-2024-39458|2024-06-26T17:06:26.399Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20structs%20plugin
item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.title: CVE-2024-2216|2024-03-06T17:01:52.616Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker-build-step%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in an HTTP endpoint in Jenkins docker-build-step Plugin 2.11 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified TCP or Unix socket URL, and to reconfigure the plugin using the provided connection test parameters, affecting future build step executions.

item.title: CVE-2024-2215|2024-03-06T17:01:52.007Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker-build-step%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins docker-build-step Plugin 2.11 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified TCP or Unix socket URL, and to reconfigure the plugin using the provided connection test parameters, affecting future build step executions.

item.title: CVE-2024-34147|2024-06-04T17:41:24.679Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20telegram%20bot%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Telegram Bot Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier stores the Telegram Bot token unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2024-34146|2024-06-04T17:41:47.091Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20server%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git server Plugin 114.v068a_c7cc2574 and earlier does not perform a permission check for read access to a Git repository over SSH, allowing attackers with a previously configured SSH public key but lacking Overall/Read permission to access these repositories.

item.title: CVE-2024-34145|2024-06-06T18:23:32.356Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving sandbox-defined classes that shadow specific non-sandbox-defined classes in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34148|2024-06-04T17:42:07.420Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier programmatically disables the fix for CVE-2016-3721 whenever a build is triggered from a release tag, by setting the Java system property 'hudson.model.ParametersAction.keepUndefinedParameters'.

item.title: CVE-2024-34144|2024-06-06T18:23:11.386Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving crafted constructor bodies in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-5273|2024-05-24T13:46:09.897Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20report%20info%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Report Info Plugin 1.2 and earlier does not perform path validation of the workspace directory while serving report files, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to retrieve Surefire failures, PMD violations, Findbugs bugs, and Checkstyle errors on the controller file system by editing the workspace path.

item.title: CVE-2024-28154|2024-06-04T18:03:06.484Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mq%20notifier%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins MQ Notifier Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier logs potentially sensitive build parameters as part of debug information in build logs by default.

item.title: CVE-2024-28162|2024-06-04T18:03:09.469Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20delphix%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Delphix Plugin 3.0.1 through 3.1.0 (both inclusive) a global option for administrators to enable or disable SSL/TLS certificate validation for Data Control Tower (DCT) connections fails to take effect until Jenkins is restarted when switching from disabled validation to enabled validation.

item.title: CVE-2024-28158|2024-03-06T17:01:59.995Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier allows attackers to trigger a build.

item.title: CVE-2024-28159|2024-03-06T17:02:00.731Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Read permission to trigger a build.

item.title: CVE-2024-28155|2024-06-04T18:03:13.356Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20appspider%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins AppSpider Plugin 1.0.16 and earlier does not perform permission checks in several HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to obtain information about available scan config names, engine group names, and client names.

item.title: CVE-2024-28152|2024-03-06T17:01:56.184Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 866.vdea_7dcd3008e and earlier, except 848.850.v6a_a_2a_234a_c81, when discovering pull requests from forks, the trust policy "Forks in the same account" allows changes to Jenkinsfiles from users without write access to the project when using Bitbucket Server.

item.title: CVE-2024-28153|2024-06-04T18:03:26.345Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20owasp%20dependency-check%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin 5.4.5 and earlier does not escape vulnerability metadata from Dependency-Check reports, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28149|2024-06-04T18:03:30.882Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.16 through 1.32 (both inclusive) does not properly sanitize input, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to implement cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks and to determine whether a path on the Jenkins controller file system exists.

item.title: CVE-2024-28150|2024-06-04T18:03:41.778Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.32 and earlier does not escape job names, report names, and index page titles shown as part of the report frame, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2024-28151|2024-06-04T18:03:47.410Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.32 and earlier archives invalid symbolic links in report directories on agents and recreates them on the controller, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to determine whether a path on the Jenkins controller file system exists, without being able to access it.

item.title: CVE-2024-28156|2024-06-04T18:03:53.240Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20monitor%20view%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Build Monitor View Plugin 1.14-860.vd06ef2568b_3f and earlier does not escape Build Monitor View names, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure Build Monitor Views.

item.title: CVE-2024-28160|2024-06-04T18:03:57.423Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20icescrum%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins iceScrum Plugin 1.1.6 and earlier does not sanitize iceScrum project URLs on build views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs.

item.title: CVE-2024-28161|2024-06-04T18:04:02.925Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20delphix%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Delphix Plugin 3.0.1, a global option for administrators to enable or disable SSL/TLS certificate validation for Data Control Tower (DCT) connections is disabled by default.

item.title: CVE-2024-28157|2024-03-06T17:01:59.358Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitbucket%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins GitBucket Plugin 0.8 and earlier does not sanitize Gitbucket URLs on build views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs.

item.title: CVE-2024-39459|2024-06-26T18:32:51.005Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20plain%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: In rare cases Jenkins Plain Credentials Plugin 182.v468b_97b_9dcb_8 and earlier stores secret file credentials unencrypted (only Base64 encoded) on the Jenkins controller file system, where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system (global credentials) or with Item/Extended Read permission (folder-scoped credentials).

item.title: CVE-2024-39458|2024-07-05T17:22:42.883Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20structs%20plugin
item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.title: CVE-2024-28157|2024-07-23T15:53:18.459Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitbucket%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins GitBucket Plugin 0.8 and earlier does not sanitize Gitbucket URLs on build views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs.

item.title: CVE-2024-2215|2024-08-01T19:03:39.139Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker-build-step%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins docker-build-step Plugin 2.11 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified TCP or Unix socket URL, and to reconfigure the plugin using the provided connection test parameters, affecting future build step executions.

item.title: CVE-2024-2216|2024-08-01T19:03:39.393Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker-build-step%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in an HTTP endpoint in Jenkins docker-build-step Plugin 2.11 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified TCP or Unix socket URL, and to reconfigure the plugin using the provided connection test parameters, affecting future build step executions.

item.title: CVE-2024-28162|2024-08-02T00:48:49.411Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20delphix%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Delphix Plugin 3.0.1 through 3.1.0 (both inclusive) a global option for administrators to enable or disable SSL/TLS certificate validation for Data Control Tower (DCT) connections fails to take effect until Jenkins is restarted when switching from disabled validation to enabled validation.

item.title: CVE-2024-28156|2024-08-02T00:48:49.459Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20monitor%20view%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Build Monitor View Plugin 1.14-860.vd06ef2568b_3f and earlier does not escape Build Monitor View names, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure Build Monitor Views.

item.title: CVE-2024-28155|2024-08-02T00:48:49.350Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20appspider%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins AppSpider Plugin 1.0.16 and earlier does not perform permission checks in several HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to obtain information about available scan config names, engine group names, and client names.

item.title: CVE-2024-28157|2024-08-02T00:48:49.359Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitbucket%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins GitBucket Plugin 0.8 and earlier does not sanitize Gitbucket URLs on build views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs.

item.title: CVE-2024-28158|2024-08-02T00:48:49.142Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier allows attackers to trigger a build.

item.title: CVE-2024-28159|2024-08-02T00:48:49.359Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Read permission to trigger a build.

item.title: CVE-2024-28160|2024-08-02T00:48:49.535Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20icescrum%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins iceScrum Plugin 1.1.6 and earlier does not sanitize iceScrum project URLs on build views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs.

item.title: CVE-2024-28152|2024-08-02T00:48:49.402Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 866.vdea_7dcd3008e and earlier, except 848.850.v6a_a_2a_234a_c81, when discovering pull requests from forks, the trust policy "Forks in the same account" allows changes to Jenkinsfiles from users without write access to the project when using Bitbucket Server.

item.title: CVE-2024-28150|2024-08-02T00:48:49.113Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.32 and earlier does not escape job names, report names, and index page titles shown as part of the report frame, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2024-28153|2024-08-02T00:48:49.418Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20owasp%20dependency-check%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin 5.4.5 and earlier does not escape vulnerability metadata from Dependency-Check reports, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28154|2024-08-02T00:48:49.469Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mq%20notifier%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins MQ Notifier Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier logs potentially sensitive build parameters as part of debug information in build logs by default.

item.title: CVE-2024-28149|2024-08-02T00:48:48.971Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.16 through 1.32 (both inclusive) does not properly sanitize input, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to implement cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks and to determine whether a path on the Jenkins controller file system exists.

item.title: CVE-2024-28151|2024-08-02T00:48:49.387Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.32 and earlier archives invalid symbolic links in report directories on agents and recreates them on the controller, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to determine whether a path on the Jenkins controller file system exists, without being able to access it.

item.title: CVE-2024-28161|2024-08-02T00:48:49.181Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20delphix%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Delphix Plugin 3.0.1, a global option for administrators to enable or disable SSL/TLS certificate validation for Data Control Tower (DCT) connections is disabled by default.

item.title: CVE-2024-39458|2024-08-02T04:26:14.270Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20structs%20plugin
item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.title: CVE-2024-39459|2024-08-02T04:26:14.969Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20plain%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: In rare cases Jenkins Plain Credentials Plugin 182.v468b_97b_9dcb_8 and earlier stores secret file credentials unencrypted (only Base64 encoded) on the Jenkins controller file system, where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system (global credentials) or with Item/Extended Read permission (folder-scoped credentials).

item.title: CVE-2024-39460|2024-08-02T04:26:15.217Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 886.v44cf5e4ecec5 and earlier prints the Bitbucket OAuth access token as part of the Bitbucket URL in the build log in some cases.
